hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e -v rm -rf codechecker-results rm -rf obj-firefox/
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j16" mk_add_options AUTOCLOBBER=1 mk_add_options MOZ_OBJDIR=@TOPSRCDIR@/obj-firefox EOF ./mach clobber
awk '{print "-*"$1"*"}' tools/rewriting/ThirdPartyPaths.txt > skip.list cat >> skip.list <<EOF -/usr/* -*/xpcom/tests/* -*/mfbt/tests/* -*/dom/bindings/Test* EOF
source ~/workspace/update-codechecker/venv/bin/activate
pip install thrift==0.11.0 pip install psycopg2 export PATH=~/workspace/update-codechecker/build/CodeChecker/bin:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin/:$PATH nohup bash ~/run-server-codechecker.sh & cat ~/workspace/update-codechecker/build/CodeChecker/config/package_layout.json
CHECKERS=$(CodeChecker checkers |awk '{print "--enable " $1}'|grep -v -E '(google-readability-todo|android-|hicpp-no-assembler|fuchsia-|debug\.)') echo $CHECKERS
#cargo install --force cbindgen
./mach configure ./mach build pre-export export ./mach build-backend -b CompileDB # See https://github.com/Ericsson/codechecker/issues/2103 sed -i -e "s|-include /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/firefox-codechecker/config/gcc_hidden.h||g" obj-firefox/compile_commands.json
CodeChecker check -j 13 --logfile obj-firefox/compile_commands.json -o codechecker-results $CHECKERS --timeout 120 --skip skip.list CodeChecker store codechecker-results/ -n firefox_$(date "+%Y%m%d%H%M") --url firefox #rm -rf obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/ rm -rf obj-firefox/
